Name: Avacyn, Guardian of Hope
Story Background: Avacyn, once the guardian of Innistrad, has returned from her slumber to protect the innocents and restore hope to the embattled plane.
Ability: Flying, Vigilance, Lifelink. When Avacyn, Guardian of Hope enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Appearance Description: Avacyn is depicted as a majestic angel with shimmering wings, radiating a warm, protective light to those around her. Her presence exudes strength and hope, inspiring those who fight for justice.
